    • getDelay

      public int getDelay​(int n)
      Gets display duration for specified frame.
      Parameters:
      n - int index of frame
      Returns:
      delay in milliseconds

    • getFrameCount

      public int getFrameCount()
      Gets the number of frames read from file.
      Returns:
      frame count

    • getPixmap

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Pixmap getPixmap()
      Gets the first (or only) image read.
      Returns:
      BufferedPixmap containing first frame, or null if none.

    • getLoopCount

      public int getLoopCount()
      Gets the "Netscape" iteration count, if any. A count of 0 means repeat indefinitely.
      Returns:
      iteration count if one was specified, else 1.

    • setPixels

      protected void setPixels()
      Creates new frame image from current data (and previous frames as specified by their disposition codes).

    • getFrame

      public GifDecoder.DixieMap getFrame​(int n)
      Gets the image contents of frame n.
      Returns:
      BufferedPixmap representation of frame, or null if n is invalid.

    • read

      public int read​(java.io.InputStream is)
      Reads GIF image from stream
      Parameters:
      is - containing GIF file.
      Returns:
      read status code (0 = no errors)

    • decodeBitmapData

      protected void decodeBitmapData()
      Decodes LZW image data into pixel array. Adapted from John Cristy's BitmapMagick.

    • err

      protected boolean err()
      Returns true if an error was encountered during reading/decoding

    • readColorTable

      protected int[] readColorTable​(int ncolors)
      Reads color table as 256 RGB integer values
      Parameters:
      ncolors - int number of colors to read
      Returns:
      int array containing 256 colors (packed ARGB with full alpha)
